description: This is an HTML source file for a web-based database viewer interface, including embedded CSS and JavaScript that facilitate browsing and displaying database schemas and data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of database names and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, reloading data from the server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database item to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a specific database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads data for a selected table and renders it in the main view.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates and inserts an HTML table with the queried data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling different data types and expansion logic.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full content or a truncated preview.
